title: Random DCing in games
body: the past two days i have been randomly getting DCed in games alot of times in fights. im running a 3k build so its not my system im also on google fiber 1 GB download speeds and i check while im DCed and im still able to run internet on everything else but i get DCed the whole time my game shows me having 31-32 ping im very confused on whats happening but really want to get it fixed...

replies.body: If it started happening randomly like that and is persisting pretty well, I'd venture to guess there might be some routing issues or ISP problems. Do me a favor and run a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) if you aren't sure how to run a trace. That should give me a decent idea of what's going on.
fixed the issue, it was the modem my network up/downlink buffering was way high replaced modem and fixed it.
